layout.singingstanza: My goal is God Him -- self, not joy, nor peace, Nor e -- ven bless -- ing, but Him -- self, my God; 'Tis His to lead me there— not mine, but His— At a -- ny cost, dear Lord, by a -- ny road. by a -- ny road.

lyrics.stanza: So faith bounds forward to its goal in God, And love can trust her Lord to lead her there; Upheld by Him, my soul is following hard Till God hath full fulfilled my deepest prayer.
No matter if the way be sometimes dark, No matter though the cost be oft-times great, He knoweth how I best shall reach the mark, The way that leads to Him must needs be strait.
